item.title: Download Optical Mark Recognition C# DLL | Aspose.OMR API
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.OMR to Read Human-marked Data Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.OMR and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.OMR   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA

item.title: Download Python Library to Perform OCR | Aspose.OCR API
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.OCR for Python via .NET for image recognition. Add optical character recognition (OCR) capabilities to your data science, AI, and automation solutions written in Python 3.6 or later. Extract text from photos, scans, PDF documents and other graphical files without having to delve into complex mathematical operations, neural networks, and other technical details. Aspose.OCR for Python via .NET can be download here and installed from local file system with the following pip command: Release Notes Download > pip install aspose-ocr-python-net

Create alternative message bodies.

item.title: Exporter for PowerPoint | Aspose.Slides for JasperReports
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Slides to Export JasperReports® to Presentation Formats Aspose.Slides for JasperReports is a lightweight extension that helps you export reports from JasperReports® and JasperServer® to Microsoft PowerPoint® and other supported file formats. Release Notes Download Product Page | Docs | API Reference | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA Presentation JasperReports® Integration Features Export reports to PPT, PPTX, HTML, and PDF formats.

item.title: On-premise 2D Vector Graphics API | Aspose.Drawing
item.description: Support Forum Aspose.Drawing for .NET Download DLL of 2D drawing APIs identical to GDI+ to render & convert vector graphics (lines, curves, and figures) as well as multi-style text within .NET Apps. Aspose.Drawing for Java Aspose.Drawing for Java supports rendering vector graphics such as lines, curves, and figures as well as text in a variety of fonts, sizes, and styles onto raster images.
